eng: “Do not fear, men! You are the great warriors of the Jingdong!”
zh-cn: 军令如山，不听约束者皆斩之。
zh-tw: 軍令如山，不聽約束者皆斬之。

eng: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you will be formidable in battle.
If you survive the battle, I'll treat you to dinner!
zh-cn: 设下酒宴，待将军得胜归来！
zh-tw: 設下酒宴，待將軍得勝歸來！

eng: Pang De marches to battle with an empty coffin in his vanguard. It will not remain empty.
zh-cn: 庞德要么会取得胜利，要么就是死战入土。
zh-tw: 龐德要麼會取得勝利，要麼就是死戰入土。

eng: Zhu Tu and Zhu Beng have witnessed first-hand how power steadily corrupted their former friend Zheng Jiang.
Her cultured and considerate approach boosts the army’s fighting skill and spirit.
zh-cn: 熟读兵书，精通兵法之将领可令千人有万人之威。
zh-tw: 熟讀兵書，精通兵法之將領可令千人有萬人之威。

eng: A noble guardian protects his people at all costs.
The hopes of her people rest squarely on her shoulders; Lady Trieu will not fail them.
zh-cn: 身背骆越人民的希望，赵贞娘绝不会退缩。
zh-tw: 身背駱越人民的希望，趙貞娘絕不會退縮。

eng: “Protect me! Sacrifice your life if you must!”
zh-cn: 宁舍尔命，也得保障夫人毫发无伤。
zh-tw: 寧舍爾命，也得保障夫人毫髮無傷。

eng: How did the state of affairs end up so dire...
Revered for his allegiance to his Lord and his cause, Shen Pei shall never retreat as long as his Lord’s interests are threatened.
zh-cn: 就算被围，也拒不投降，背水一战。
zh-tw: 就算被圍，也拒不投降，背水一戰。

eng: Yan Xiang’s calculated and prudent counsel prevails again and again.
zh-cn: 「昔周自后稷至于文王，积德累功，三分天下有其二，犹服事殷。明公虽奕世克昌，未若有周之盛，汉室虽微，未若殷纣之暴也。」
zh-tw: 「昔周自後稷至於文王，積德累功，三分天下有其二，猶服事殷。明公雖奕世克昌，未若有周之盛，漢室雖微，未若殷紂之暴也。」

eng: Lü Ji, gifted with uncanny martial talent and the ambition to hone her skills, wreaks havoc on the battlefield.
zh-cn: 父为吕奉先，吕姬天赋异禀。
zh-tw: 父爲呂奉先，呂姬天賦異稟。

eng: The favor of nature, though bountiful, does not come often.
zh-cn: 来自于自然的恩惠，可是不可多得的。
zh-tw: 來自於自然的恩惠，可是不可多得的。

eng: The roar of the tyrant hardens even the most cowardly soldier.
zh-cn: 暴君的怒吼能让最懦弱的士兵也士气高昂，坚如磐石。
zh-tw: 暴君的怒吼能讓最懦弱的士兵也士氣高昂，堅如磐石。

eng: Legends speak of a woman who slips in and out of the shadows of Heishan...
zh-cn: 传黑山有一女，能如遁迹匿影，来去自如。
zh-tw: 傳黑山有一女，能如遁跡匿影，來去自如。

eng: Most men would voluntarily take on an entire army alone, if it means escaping the tantrum of this insufferable child.
zh-cn: 将士宁可上阵出生入死，也不肯在营中被将军责骂。
zh-tw: 將士寧可上陣出生入死，也不肯在營中被將軍責罵。

eng: One cannot save one’s friends from impending disaster if they do not listen.
zh-cn: 为国者以民为基，民以衣食为本。
zh-tw: 爲國者以民爲基，民以衣食爲本。

eng: Under Zhang Xun’s leadership, his army is truly invincible.
By anticipating the enemy’s movement, Yan Xiang is able to outmaneuver and catch them off-guard.
“Tell me your opinion, but do be courteous about it.”
zh-cn: 如有要事禀告，务必以礼相待。
zh-tw: 如有要事稟告，務必以禮相待。

eng: Those attracted to the charms of Lady Zhu... beware.
zh-cn: 「不知夫人今宵愿与我同席共枕否？」
zh-tw: 「不知夫人今宵願與我同席共枕否？」

eng: “Come on, come on! You’ll have to deal with Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei first! Haha!”
zh-cn: 你难道想在沙场上于刘关张相会？
zh-tw: 你難道想在沙場上於劉關張相會？

eng: So terrifying is Zhang Bao’s booming howl, it has unhorsed enemy generals.
zh-cn: 犹如其父亲张飞，张苞的怒吼同样也是响彻云霄。
zh-tw: 猶如其父親張飛，張苞的怒吼同樣也是響徹雲霄。

eng: Named after the beauty of the shining stars, Zhang Xueer does her namesake justice in battle, becoming a swift rush of death and elegance.
zh-cn: 张氏在战场上由于天上流星一般，美丽绝伦却又危险。
zh-tw: 張氏在戰場上由於天上流星一般，美麗絕倫卻又危險。

eng: Diaochan knows how to encourage frightened warriors and lead them to battle.
Zhang Xun leads the point of the attack and his men rally around him.
Her knowledge spreads to fellow generals around her like the veins of a stream.
zh-cn: 没人能不被蔡文姬浑身上下都散发着的学识所影响。
zh-tw: 沒人能不被蔡文姬渾身上下都散發着的學識所影響。

eng: The bandits’ covert movements and attacks are as swift as they are deadly.
zh-cn: 匿影藏形于林宇之间，狠下毒手，攻其敌于不备。
zh-tw: 匿影藏形於林宇之間，狠下毒手，攻其敵於不備。

zh-cn: 将帅之安危岂可不保乎？
zh-tw: 將帥之安危豈可不保乎？

eng: Once Yan Liang angers, he can quite literally crush his opponent.
zh-cn: 被激怒了的淳于琼，将全力以赴，力战身死。
zh-tw: 被激怒了的淳于瓊，將全力以赴，力戰身死。

eng: With her behind them, Hou Jinting’s troops battle on with renewed vigor.
Yuan Anyang’s grace and personality exude warmth.
When possessing power or authority, he behaves superciliously.
Cai Yan’s word inspired emotion in the arts and, now, that language gives life to the battlefield.
zh-cn: 能言雄辩之人有时甚于一员猛将。
zh-tw: 能言雄辯之人有時甚於一員猛將。

eng: Your spirit will be remembered forever.
zh-cn: 将士们的所做所为将流芳百世！
zh-tw: 將士們的所做所爲將流芳百世！

eng: The Qiang are on horseback before they can walk; their horsemanship is second nature.
zh-cn: 羌人自小学习骑术，骑术十分了得。
zh-tw: 羌人自小學習騎術，騎術十分了得。

eng: Father and daughter, together in battle, is an ill omen for their rivals as was the mythical Hong.
As the fight goes on, Chunyu Qiong’s rage and stubbornness will turn him into a reckless, but powerful fighter, rushing in the thick of battle over and over.
Beneath the beauty, there lives a beast.
zh-cn: 美貌之下，藏着一头桀骜不驯的猛兽。
zh-tw: 美貌之下，藏着一頭桀驁不馴的猛獸。

eng: Strong of will, but without tact. Shen Pei charges into the fray without hesitation, pushing his men with him, willing to win by determination alone.
zh-cn: 独拥残兵守邺城，审配慷慨壮烈。
zh-tw: 獨擁殘兵守鄴城，審配慷慨壯烈。

eng: This special pearl, gifted by Zhang Fei, has protected Guan Yinping from all kinds of danger
zh-cn: 「漫道无华争俏丽,长青更胜一时芳。」
zh-tw: 「漫道無華爭俏麗,長青更勝一時芳。」

eng: Huang Zu feigns retreat, only to rapidly re-engage the unsuspecting enemy and give his men the upperhand.
zh-cn: 即使是逆境之下，黄祖也不会退缩。
zh-tw: 即使是逆境之下，黃祖也不會退縮。

eng: Luo Jun has survived several attempts on his life.
zh-cn: 遭扰攘之时，值兵革之际。
zh-tw: 遭擾攘之時，值兵革之際。

eng: Luo Jun has survived several assassination attempts
zh-cn: 遭扰攘之时，值兵革之际。
zh-tw: 遭擾攘之時，值兵革之際。

eng: Once targeted, the enemy cannot escape from Yijian Liting.
Lu Zheng’s steady and skilled hands know how to strike quickly.
zh-cn: 陆政使用长弓手到擒来，总能先人一步拉弓搭箭。
zh-tw: 陸政使用長弓手到擒來，總能先人一步拉弓搭箭。

eng: Heaven decides the victor, but Chunyu Qiong will not surrender. As death approaches, he redoubles his efforts in a desperate last stand.
The Zhu sisters have pledged to live, fight, and die together.
zh-cn: 臭味相投，不求同生，只求共死。
zh-tw: 臭味相投，不求同生，只求共死。

eng: Even on the battlefield, witty talk boosts your energy.
zh-cn: 能言之人在就算战场上也能用唇舌鼓舞三军。
zh-tw: 能言之人在就算戰場上也能用脣舌鼓舞三軍。

eng: Zhang Bao charges mightily into the enemy, heedless of any dangers.
zh-cn: 「亮以张苞为虎翼将军，杖前右护卫使。」
zh-tw: 「亮以張苞爲虎翼將軍，杖前右護衛使。」

eng: Dong Bai's infernal grandfather always keeps an eye on her.
zh-cn: 栖身与暴君鹯狼身旁，董白已练就金刚不坏之身。
zh-tw: 棲身與暴君鸇狼身旁，董白已練就金剛不壞之身。

eng: Xun Yu’s firm and unbroken will is an example to all soldiers.
zh-cn: 荀彧坚定不移的意志是将士之范。
zh-tw: 荀彧堅定不移的意志是將士之範。

eng: Who can defend against that which he cannot see?
Lady Trieu has devoted her life to the fight for freedom.
zh-cn: 为光复骆越而战，岂可浪费时间于男女情长。
zh-tw: 爲光復駱越而戰，豈可浪費時間於男女情長。

eng: Pang De promises only death - to his adversary, or to himself.
zh-cn: 庞德冲锋时不顾自身死活，总是捷足先登。
zh-tw: 龐德衝鋒時不顧自身死活，總是捷足先登。

eng: Ma Yunlu disregards fatigue as she fights and rages in combat.
zh-cn: 马云禄战起来称其为废寝忘食也不为过。
zh-tw: 馬雲祿戰起來稱其爲廢寢忘食也不爲過。

eng: Gaun Xing drives his men without mercy, yet it always proves effective.
zh-cn: 关兴对他的手下也从不手下留情，这令他的部曲令人生畏。
zh-tw: 關興對他的手下也從不手下留情，這令他的部曲令人生畏。

eng: Yuan Anyang’s unabating beauty encourages the soldiers and drives them to fight more passionately.
zh-cn: 美妙的芬芳在前线总能鼓舞将士们勇猛杀敌。
zh-tw: 美妙的芬芳在前線總能鼓舞將士們勇猛殺敵。

eng: Hua Xin knows and accepts that terrible acts must be committed to preserve his status within the hierarchy.
zh-cn: 高瞻之论还需配上愿听忠言之明主。
zh-tw: 高瞻之論還需配上願聽忠言之明主。

eng: Is that all you have for me?
zh-cn: 如此寥寥无几，也敢奉上？
zh-tw: 如此寥寥無幾，也敢奉上？

eng: Her dignity and wisdom are already renown near and far.
zh-cn: 孙吴国太为人刚强正直，德才兼备。
zh-tw: 孫吳國太爲人剛強正直，德才兼備。

eng: There aren't many women who can handle the monarch of the century.
The beauty of bridge and bridge is widely known in Gangdong. \\n For them, there is even a line of soldiers who want to protect their country at the risk of their lives.
zh-cn: 二乔的美貌名扬江东。为了她们，士卒们愿意出生入死，保家卫国。
zh-tw: 二喬的美貌名揚江東。爲了她們，士卒們願意出生入死，保家衛國。

eng: Recalling their intense training, these generals reform with startling quickness.
zh-cn: 部队结成矛尖阵型，可以迅速杀透敌军战线
zh-tw: 部隊結成矛尖陣型，可以迅速殺透敵軍戰線

eng: Even the strongest of warriors are temporarily immobilized when a pressure point is struck.
Lu Zheng never misses the prey.
zh-cn: 陆政的猎物对她来说犹如瓮中捉鳖。
zh-tw: 陸政的獵物對她來說猶如甕中捉鱉。

eng: “Hurry, drink this panacea and all your troubles will slip away.”
zh-cn: 我视你为友，你竟然因一片黄金而与我割席而坐。
zh-tw: 我視你爲友，你竟然因一片黃金而與我割席而坐。

eng: Hua Lanli’s pinpoint accuracy strikes fear in the enemy.
zh-cn: 华氏射出的飞箭如漫天蝗虫一般袭向敌手，令人变貌失色。
zh-tw: 華氏射出的飛箭如漫天蝗蟲一般襲向敵手，令人變貌失色。

eng: Relentless fire from Hua Lanli pins the enemy back.
Huang Zu is famed to have placed the tiger of Jiangdong in his coffin
zh-cn: 黄祖最善于百步之外阴袭敌军。
zh-tw: 黃祖最善於百步之外陰襲敵軍。

eng: Huang Zu is famed to have put the Tiger of Jiangdong in his coffin.
zh-cn: 黄祖最善于百步之外阴袭敌军。
zh-tw: 黃祖最善於百步之外陰襲敵軍。

eng: White Tempest violently tramples the ground, stunning all in close proximity.
zh-cn: 战象的猛然一跺，足以碾碎脚下的一切。
zh-tw: 戰象的猛然一跺，足以碾碎腳下的一切。

eng: Revenge is the act of passion, vengeance is an act of justice. For Zhang Bao, both are one and the same.
zh-cn: 敌军势穷，怎可不乘胜追击？
zh-tw: 敵軍勢窮，怎可不乘勝追擊？

eng: Rumors speak of a man in Yangan who can wrestle an ox
zh-cn: 有传言说有一人可以徒手驯服一头暴怒的公牛。
zh-tw: 有傳言說有一人可以徒手馴服一頭暴怒的公牛。

eng: The crushing blow is delivered by Zhang Xun’s own hand.
Fierce as a lion and as unrelenting as the wind, Pang De may be the finest warrior Xiliang ever produced.
zh-cn: 庞德既能与关公死战，那也必能匹敌马超。
zh-tw: 龐德既能與關公死戰，那也必能匹敵馬超。

eng: Like a coiled viper, Zhang Xueer strikes so rapidly that it’s virtually unavoidable.
The martial prowess of Guan Yu has been passed on to his child.
zh-cn: 一脉相承，不愧为武圣之女！
zh-tw: 一脈相承，不愧爲武聖之女！

eng: Ma Yunlu’s double sword dance is beautiful as it is lethal.
Lady Trieu leaves a path of destruction in her wake.
zh-cn: 赵妪所经之处无所不催。
zh-tw: 趙嫗所經之處無所不催。

eng: Yijian Liting is both relentless and persistent in her approach.
zh-cn: 持久且不衰，伊健丽婷永不放弃。
zh-tw: 持久且不衰，伊健麗婷永不放棄。

eng: Like father, like daughter - Lü Ji’s uncontrollable temper decimates the enemy.
In the name of honor and the people, the virtuous Luo Jun strikes hard and true.
zh-cn: 正气凛然，骆俊的重击充满着正义与民意。
zh-tw: 正氣凜然，駱俊的重擊充滿着正義與民意。

eng: A blow with all of Chunyu’s strength, mighty as a thunderstrike.
Someone who stands out among the people.
Every person has their own path.
You are royal. Act like it.
zh-cn: 九五之尊，当彰显帝王气度。
zh-tw: 您是皇帝，就該有皇帝的樣子。

eng: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
zh-cn: 授人以鱼，不如授人以渔
zh-tw: 授人以魚不如教之以漁。

eng: Coherence in thought and speech brings clear advantage.
zh-cn: 巧言善辩会带来显著的优势

eng: The industrious need no orders to galvanise them into action.
zh-cn: 勤奋的人，无需任何指引便可行动起来
zh-tw: 勤勉之人不需命令也會行動。

eng: Like the weather, one's fortune may change by the evening.
zh-cn: 天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福
zh-tw: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福。

eng: Virtue cannot be acquired, only nurtured.
zh-cn: 美德并非天成，只可造就
zh-tw: 修德非一蹴可幾，須時刻培養。

eng: With no knowledge of what cannot be done, you will accomplish great things.
zh-cn: 心怀克服万难之决意，方可成就大事
zh-tw: 不知其不可為而為者，當能成就大事。

eng: The pillar is strongest at its base.
zh-cn: 柱石不倒，在其根基厚实

eng: What you do not wish upon yourself, extend not to others.
Motivating men to fight is the essense of leadership.
zh-cn: 激发部卒斗志乃是为将的精髓。
zh-tw: 激發部卒鬥志乃是爲將的精髓。

eng: With skin of earth, arrows rebound, harmless.
zh-cn: 凭地利，如披坚甲，箭若无物。
zh-tw: 皮若堅石，箭矢觸及皆反彈無傷。

eng: Soldiers gather under the banner of this hero.
zh-cn: 军士聚于此英雄之旗下。
zh-tw: 军士聚于此英雄之旗下。

eng: A charge, fuelled by stern hearts and sterner blades, will rip enemy lines apart.
zh-cn: 坚定之心，锋利宝刃，足以撕破敌阵
zh-tw: 以堅定的心智和強硬的刀刃發起衝鋒，便能一舉撕裂敵陣。

eng: A devastating swing with the power of the risen inferno!
zh-tw: 挾帶竄升烈火之力的毀滅一擊！

eng: Few can escape this warrior's pursuit.
zh-cn: 很少有人能逃过这位勇士的追杀。
zh-tw: 很少有人能逃過這位勇士的追殺。

eng: This hero believes you can only kill that which you can catch.
zh-cn: 此人行动迅如狡兔，万军擒拿亦若无物。
zh-tw: 此人相信，要將敵人除之而後快，就必須先追得上敵人。

eng: A charge, fuelled by stern hearts and sterner blades, that will rip enemy lines apart.
zh-cn: 坚定之心，锋利宝刃，足以撕破敌阵
zh-tw: 以堅定的心智和強硬的刀刃發起衝鋒，便能一舉撕裂敵陣。

eng: Knowledge that your comrades will never abandon you brings tremendous comfort.
zh-tw: 知道同胞絕不會捨自己而去，能讓人大感安心。

eng: A war cry from one warrior to another.
zh-tw: 從一名戰士傳達到另一名戰士的戰鬥口號。

eng: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.
zh-cn: 敬爱山林，林即如家，山是前路。
zh-tw: 森林為懂得尊重的人提供了通行路徑和更穩固的立足之地。

eng: Look up and you will see the sky; look inward and you will see heaven.
zh-cn: 上观则为天，深察则为妙
zh-tw: 往頭上看，看到的是天空，往心裡看，看到的便是黃天。

eng: A single shot, timed and aimed to perfection, outweighs a thousand wasted volleys.
zh-tw: 一千發虛擲的矢石，比不上一記時機拿捏得恰到好處的精準射擊。

eng: Generations working the land will breed a kinship with it.
zh-tw: 世世代代在土地上生息能使人培養出與土地的密切情誼。

eng: Organise your troops into a solid wall to deter horses. It's a simple but effective tactic.
zh-cn: 将士兵组成人墙来抵御马匹。此战术简单有效。
zh-tw: 將士兵組成人墻來抵禦馬匹。此戰術簡單有效。

eng: Inspirational deeds spur forces to swifter action!
zh-tw: 激勵人心之舉可鼓舞部隊加速行動！

eng: An immovable mountain against the tide of the charge.
zh-cn: 任由惊涛拍岸，我自不动如山。
zh-tw: 任由驚濤拍岸，我自不動如山。

eng: The longer this warrior fights, the stronger they become!
A warrior who feels truly alive in battle.
Shoot some crossbow-bombs for reducing morale of hostile units.
zh-cn: 射出一些弩弹，用于降低敌军士气。
zh-tw: 射出一些弩彈，用於降低敵軍士氣。

eng: This general directs and empowers his forces from a… safer distance.
zh-cn: 大将军难道不应该在远离纷争的地方运筹帷幄？
zh-tw: 大將軍難道不應該在遠離紛爭的地方運籌帷幄？

eng: With a single shot, The shooter brings death.
zh-cn: 百步穿杨，一击便可致敌于死地。
zh-tw: 百步穿楊，一擊便可致敵於死地。

eng: Cao Cao's presence unnerves the enemy general!
zh-cn: 曹操在场，敌将备受压制！
zh-tw: 曹操在場，敵將備受壓制！

eng: This shooter fires and fires, faster and faster, never relenting.
zh-cn: 此弓手一箭紧接一箭，一箭快过一箭。
zh-tw: 此弓手不斷引弓放箭，越放越快，毫不留手。

eng: Born to hold the line, This warrior shrugs off attacks as if they were nothing!
zh-cn: 此人真乃守御惊世之才，敌众猛攻视若无物！
zh-tw: 此人是天生的護衛將才，所有攻擊對他來說都不痛不癢！

eng: Fan the flames of war with inextinguishable anger.
zh-cn: 以不灭的怒气煽动战火。
zh-tw: 以不滅的怒氣煽動戰火。

eng: No one dares to challenge this warrior's skill with the blade.
zh-cn: 此人武功盖世，无能出其右者。
zh-tw: 此人武功蓋世，無能出其右者。

eng: There's something about this strike that just feels off.
zh-cn: 这种攻击似乎阴险歹毒。
zh-tw: 這種攻擊似乎陰險歹毒。

eng: Send your warriors into the thick of battle and watch as they fight even more fiercely.
zh-cn: 将你的勇士们送入战场，看着他们更加激烈的战斗。
zh-tw: 将你的勇士们送入战场，看着他们更加激烈的战斗。

eng: The light that burns twice as bright burns half as long.
zh-cn: 火势越猛，持烧之时越短。
zh-tw: 火勢越猛，持燒之時越短。

eng: Reassuring words prevent soldiers from wavering on a chaotic battlefield.
zh-cn: 安慰之言以防士卒于乱战中摇摆不定。
zh-tw: 安慰之言以防士卒于乱战中摇摆不定。

eng: These words will bring shame and humiliation.
zh-tw: 這樣的話語會帶來羞愧與恥辱。

eng: A furious strike that sends anyone nearby reeling.
zh-cn: 充满怒意的一击，周遭敌军尽受其害
zh-tw: 飽含怒火的一擊，令周遭敵人無不搖晃欲倒。

eng: Did you get the boat fare? Heaven! Earth! Mankind!!
zh-cn: 奈何桥前可奈何，三生石上写三生。
zh-tw: 奈何橋前可奈何，三生石上寫三生。

eng: This general's orders are absolute and cannot be refused, no matter how unreasonable they may be.
zh-cn: 命令不易实行但却不可不从。
zh-tw: 命令不易實行但卻不可不從。
組成無隙可乘的防禦陣型。

eng: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.
zh-tw: 能激勵人的不見得是命令的內容，也可能是發號施令的方法。

eng: A master of the battlefield can undermine even the surest of soldiers.
zh-tw: 熟知戰場的人即使面對最有把握的士兵，也能動搖他們的自信。

eng: A merciless order, for Dong Zhuo's men and his enemies.
By the time the victim is aware of what has happened, it is already too late.
zh-cn: 等到敌人发现之时就已为时已晚。
zh-tw: 等到敵人發現之時就已爲時已晚。

eng: There is nothing to fear because the heaven is watching.
It's not a good place for a beautiful woman to stay.
This man can see all that was, and all that will be.
zh-cn: 此人鬼才满腹经纶，足以推古衍今。
zh-tw: 此人能明鑑古今，洞察未來。

eng: This warrior has an uncanny ability to unnerve enemies in wooded terrain.
zh-cn: 神鬼莫测于树林间震摄敌军。
zh-tw: 神鬼莫測於樹林間震攝敵軍。

eng: Distracts the focus of enemy ranged troops.
zh-cn: 分散敌军远程部队的注意力。
zh-tw: 分散敵軍遠程部隊的注意力。

eng: A special arrow containing a toxic substance.
zh-cn: 含有有毒物质的特殊箭头。
zh-tw: 含有有毒物質的特殊箭頭。

eng: This man has learnt to overcome defeat.
A lifetime spent learning the ways of heaven will turn thoughts into belief.
zh-tw: 畢生學習天道，便能將想法化為信念。

eng: A look at the battlefield with remarkable insight.
zh-cn: 以非凡的观察力纵观战场。
zh-tw: 以非凡的觀察力縱觀戰場。

eng: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.
zh-tw: 對自己有信心，戰士才能完全發揮實力。

eng: Xun Yu has the power to influence the emperor. No one doubts his reputation.
Sometimes it's not what you hit or how hard, but where.
zh-tw: 有時重點不在打中了什麼、打得多用力，而是打在哪裡。

eng: If you can conquer the mind of the enemy then half the battle is won.
zh-tw: 若能征服敵軍的軍心，戰鬥便贏了一半。

eng: True strength lies not in the mind or body, but within the spirit.
zh-tw: 真正的力量不在身體也不在心思，而是在靈魂中。

eng: Choose the targets to focus fire.

zh-cn: 可发出非常有力的一击。
zh-tw: 可發出非常有力的一擊。

eng: Throw a sticky pot of oil onto the enemy.
zh-cn: 扔掷易燃油罐至目标敌人。
zh-tw: 扔擲易燃油罐至目標敵人。

eng: Pride and confidence go hand in hand.

zh-cn: 展现出势不可挡的愤怒。
zh-tw: 展現出勢不可擋的憤怒。

eng: These words will fortify the spirit.
zh-tw: 這樣的話語能強化心靈。

eng: A moment's respite from battlefield to heal our troops.
zh-cn: 从战场上喘息片刻，为我军疗伤。
zh-tw: 從戰場上喘息片刻，為我軍療傷。

eng: Fearing retribution, enemies hesitate to fire upon a scion of the Han.
zh-cn: 敌人并不敢伤害汉室宗亲。
zh-tw: 敵人並不敢傷害漢室宗親。

eng: Not all of us get a second chance.
zh-cn: 不是所有人都有机会重来。
zh-tw: 不是所有人都有機會重來。

eng: No one is faster than this one.
The land is not just the earth, but the forests and mountains, and all the hidden, ancient places.
zh-cn: 千林万山皆地也，上古遗宫莫不如是
zh-tw: 大地並非只有土，還有上面的森林與山脈，以及各種神秘的古老地點。

eng: The wave of the blade push the enemy away.
zh-cn: 一道道刀浪将敌人推走。
zh-tw: 一道道刀浪將敵人推走。

eng: Someone has to take the first step even if no one wants it.
zh-cn: 遭扰攘之时，值兵革之际。
zh-tw: 遭擾攘之時，值兵革之際。

eng: His spirit is like a tiger. It takes great courage to face him.
zh-cn: 勇武如猛虎，胆敢与此人对峙之人可称之为有万夫不当之勇。
zh-tw: 勇武如猛虎，膽敢與此人對峙之人可稱之爲有萬夫不當之勇。

eng: Unease spreads among the enemy ranks.
It is the bear's teeth that the salmon faces at the end of the falls.
zh-cn: 鲑鱼游至瀑底，等待的却是熊的牙齿。
zh-tw: 鮭魚游至瀑底，等待的卻是熊的牙齒。

eng: Carefully approach and go for the throat.
zh-cn: 恶狼谨慎出击，直奔咽喉。
zh-tw: 惡狼謹慎出擊，直奔咽喉。

eng: Cut down enemies by making an arc with a blade
zh-cn: 使出一记弧形挥砍杀伤敌人
zh-tw: 使出一記弧形揮砍殺傷敵人

eng: Zhou Yu's zeal is enough to inspire others.
This man has a great understanding of geography, and can bend it to their own use.
zh-cn: 此人对山川地势了若指掌，且能善加利用。
zh-tw: 此人熟悉地理知識，能夠善加利用。

eng: This warrior's presence on the battlefield can give hope to his men, even in the most dire of situations.
zh-cn: 局势危急之际，此人拍马杀到，为手下带来希望。
zh-tw: 縱使情勢極為嚴峻，此人現身戰場上仍能為麾下兵士帶來希望。

eng: This general is as an immovable wall, inspiring his men to stand firm against much greater odds.
zh-cn: 此将有如一道铜墙铁壁，鼓舞着麾下兵士在逆境中不动如山。
zh-tw: 此將有如一堵難以撼動的牆，激勵麾下兵士堅守陣線排除萬難。

eng: With a shout, this man spurs on their horse. The warrior can plough into enemies with such force that scores of men go flying.
zh-cn: 此人大吼一声，纵马冲入敌阵，犹如一把利刃，杀得敌人血肉横飞。
zh-tw: 此人高呼一聲，策馬飛奔。他衝入敵陣的勁道之強，足以將大批士兵一舉震飛。

eng: This hero accosts the enemy hero, shaking them to the core.
zh-cn: 此英雄面对敌将，一番滔滔雄辩，令其心智动摇。
zh-tw: 此英雄向敵將大膽喊話，令對方心神動搖。

eng: This general rallies the troops to greater feats, inspiring them to make one final effort.
zh-cn: 此将集结军队，激励众将士发起最后的冲锋，建不世之功业。
zh-tw: 此將召集兵士奮勇作戰，鼓勵他們作最後一搏。

eng: The warrior flies into a rage, embodying the mighty Xiezhi, a mythical creature of great power.
zh-cn: 勇士怒发冲冠，若獬豸附身，勇不可当。
zh-tw: 勇士大發雷霆，猶如神話中強大神獸獬豸的體現。

eng: Determination and grit allow all attacks to be dodged.
zh-tw: 抱有足夠的決心與膽識便可避開所有攻勢。

eng: Only through sober and considered analysis can fragility be turned to unerring strength.
zh-cn: 要想扬长避短，须得冷静沉着、仔细思量。
zh-tw: 只有透過審慎周詳的分析，才能化弱為強。

eng: The strength of the forest brought to bear against a single foe.
zh-cn: 聚山林盛怒，以对抗一人
zh-tw: 集結全森林之力對付一個敵人。

eng: The tyrant laughs as blades glance harmlessly off his armour.
zh-cn: 望着刀刃徒劳地划过铠甲，暴君不禁朗声大笑
zh-tw: 暴君眼見刀刃碰上其護甲瞬被彈開，無法損及分毫，猖狂大笑。

eng: Zhang Fei's burly howl can rout an entire regiment!
zh-cn: 张飞仰天怒吼，敌军士气溃散！
zh-tw: 張飛仰天長嘯，使敵軍士氣潰散！

eng: A charge of great power, draining Xiahou Yuan's focus.
zh-cn: 强大力量的冲击，会消耗夏侯渊的注意力
zh-tw: 發動強力的衝鋒，使夏侯淵耗盡專注力。

eng: As Sun Ce's strength rises, his grip on rationality weakens…
zh-cn: 孙策虽愈战愈勇，但肆意猛虎愈无慎行...
zh-tw: 孫策戰力漸增，卻也愈加感情用事…

eng: Liu Zhang calls a ceasefire for all nearby units, delaying the enemy while his allies work on a counter-attack.
zh-cn: 刘璋呼吁周遭止息兵戈，以延缓敌军进攻，为友军创造反击良机。
zh-tw: 劉璋要求周遭所有單位暫時止兵，以延緩敵軍進攻，盟友則趁機準備反擊。

eng: This warrior fights with a fatal rage - an erratic fury!
zh-cn: 此勇士临战则狂，攻势狂暴猛烈！
zh-tw: 此勇士挾滔天怒火奮戰，攻勢狂暴猛烈！

eng: When weakest, Dian Wei unleashes his true power!
zh-cn: 势穷力衰，身处绝境，典韦将如恶来再现人间！
zh-tw: 典韋在傷得最重時，才會顯露出真正的實力！

eng: The roar of fury crushes enemy morale!
zh-cn: 以愤怒的怒吼压制敌人士气！
zh-tw: 狂怒的吼聲擊潰敵軍士氣！

eng: The longer this warrior fights, the greater and more inspiring they becomes!
zh-cn: 此人会随着战斗时间拉长而越战越勇，激励士气的效果也随之增强！
zh-tw: 此人會隨著戰鬥時間拉長而越戰越勇，激勵士氣的效果也隨之增強！

eng: When the victim was aware of what had happened, it must have already been a serious situation.
zh-cn: 等到被害者明白过来，就已为时已晚。
zh-tw: 等到被害者明白過來，就已爲時已晚。

eng: A shining, typical, and above all appropriate model of how one should be.
zh-tw: 此人乃是為人表率的耀眼典範，更重要的是其舉止得體。

eng: Knowing when best to shoot is most effective when you are the one being shot at.
zh-tw: 瞭解最佳的放箭時機，在輪到自己挨箭時便能收到奇效。

eng: Hurl a bundle of explosive fire bombs to knock down the enemy.
zh-cn: 扔掷爆裂火油弹来击倒敌人。
zh-tw: 扔擲爆裂火油彈來擊倒敵人。

eng: Pang Tong sacrifices himself, to aid his fellow brothers.
zh-cn: 庞统牺牲己身，协助同袍兄弟。
zh-tw: 龐統犧牲己身，協助同袍兄弟。

eng: This man knows how to frighten enemies in the woods.
zh-cn: 神鬼莫测于树林间震摄敌军。
zh-tw: 神鬼莫測於樹林間震攝敵軍。

eng: With a single blow, Guan Yu rends his enemy asunder!
zh-cn: 关羽刀光过处，敌将人头落地
zh-tw: 關羽一擊便能讓敵人手足異處！

eng: A flurry of shafts slows the enemy advance.
zh-tw: 漫天箭雨可拖慢敵人前進的速度。

eng: A carefully-placed strike hobbles the unlucky enemy.
zh-cn: 精心出突袭，使敌步蹒跚
zh-tw: 精心策劃的襲擊，讓不幸的敵人措手不及。

eng: With her graceful beauty, she stuns all around her.
zh-cn: 她运用美色，迷得周围所有人动弹不得。
zh-tw: 她運用美色，迷得周圍所有人動彈不得。

eng: Using her graceful beauty, she stuns all those around her.
zh-cn: 她运用美色，迷得周围所有人动弹不得。
zh-tw: 她運用美色，迷得周圍所有人動彈不得。

eng: Cao Cao's ordered mind encourages his forces to more efficient action!
zh-cn: 曹操的威势会激励周围所有部队，从而增强其战斗效率
zh-tw: 曹操的聰明睿智能使他的部隊行動更有效率！

eng: A reckless charge, inspiring but exhausting!
zh-cn: 勇莽冲锋可奋三军，却也颇费精力！
zh-tw: 悍然衝鋒，令人激賞，但也消耗氣力！

eng: A close observation of the battlefield can bring remarkable insights.
zh-cn: 以非凡的观察力纵观战场。
zh-tw: 以非凡的觀察力縱觀戰場。

eng: Liu Bei's words drive his men to greatness!
zh-cn: 刘备的话语可以促使麾下将士拼死效命
zh-tw: 劉備的激昂言辭引領他的部下共創偉業！

eng: Ma Chao's internal strife manifests in bursts of rage; uncontrollable charges at the enemy!
zh-cn: 心火燎原不能自已，马超化怨作勇悍而冲锋！
zh-tw: 馬超心中的不滿化作爆發的狂怒，抑制不住地直往敵人轟去！

eng: A focus on form allows one to evade and manoeuvre.
zh-cn: 专注于形则可避敌锋芒
zh-tw: 專注於身形，便能夠閃躲挪騰。

eng: Do not let emotion cloud your acuity.
zh-cn: 不可令情绪掩盖你的眼界。
zh-tw: 莫讓情緒蒙蔽心靈的敏銳。

eng: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.
zh-cn: 敬爱山林，林即如家，山是前路。
zh-tw: 森林為懂得尊重的人提供了通行路徑和更穩固的立足之地。

eng: Confidence and pride go hand in hand.
The thing to fear is not the bolt itself, but the dark and toxic unguent coated across its ever-increasing tip.
zh-cn: 敌非惧锋利，乃是怕毒厉
zh-tw: 箭矢本身倒不可怕，令人膽寒的是上頭沾染的黑毒膏。

eng: With a mighty sweep, Lü Bu strikes all around him.
zh-cn: 画戟猛烈地横扫，打击吕布周围的所有敌人
zh-tw: 呂布猛力一擊，徹底掃平周遭一眾敵軍。

eng: Should this blow strike true, the battle is done. Should it not, then… it may still also be done.
zh-cn: 此乃绝死一击，若中，则战局可定；若不中……亦可定。
zh-tw: 如果這一擊命中，戰鬥便會結束。如果沒有命中，那麼…戰鬥仍然可能結束。

eng: The tyrant rages; his men hold through fear.
zh-cn: 暴君震怒，属下瑟瑟发抖
zh-tw: 暴君盛怒，部下皆心懷恐懼。

eng: An outnumbered army will fight even harder. Skill trumps numbers.
zh-cn: 以寡击众，则士卒必效死：所谓兵不在多，而在其用
zh-tw: 以寡擊眾之軍更能背水一戰。實力遠比數量重要。

eng: The fury of the victorious warrior is fearful to behold!
zh-cn: 常胜将军雄威盛怒,敌军闻之皆尽胆寒!
zh-tw: 常勝戰士的氣焰熾熱得令人不敢直視！

eng: The attacks fall with such consistency that they are as a rain of strikes falling upon the foe.
zh-cn: 迅猛而一致的攻击，如狂风暴雨般席卷敌军。
zh-tw: 猶如驟雨般的連綿攻勢，一次次地衝擊對手。

eng: Fire explosive bolts to demoralise hostile units.
zh-cn: 扔掷爆裂弹来打击敌军士气。
zh-tw: 扔擲爆裂彈來打擊敵軍士氣。

eng: The enemy is located; the earth reveals them.
zh-cn: 地理山川暴露敌众，敌众掩迹亦可追寻！
zh-tw: 敵軍現蹤影，大地顯蹤跡。

eng: The more he is opposed, the stronger Lü Bu becomes!
zh-cn: 敌人越多，吕布就会越强大！
zh-tw: 呂布遭逢越多阻撓，就越是頑強！

eng: With a mighty cleave, Zhang Fei rends his foes' defences.
zh-cn: 张飞奋力一击，敌军防御土崩瓦解
zh-tw: 張飛強力劈擊，撕裂敵人的防線。

eng: Recalling their training, these generals reload with startling quickness.
zh-cn: 三军需依训练妙法，弯弓搭箭迅如脱兔
zh-tw: 這些將領回想起自己受過的訓練，以令人刮目相看的飛速裝填矢石。

eng: One foot in front of the other in rapid succession – this is the key to swiftness.
zh-cn: 以极快的速度迈步，这便是行动迅速的诀窍。
zh-tw: 雙腳連續快速交互向前，這就是迅敏的關鍵。

eng: With calm, steely resolve, attacks are better deflected.
zh-tw: 如鋼鐵般冷靜堅毅，就更能擋開攻勢。

eng: Lü Bu's furious gaze causes all to cower!
zh-cn: 吕布的狂怒凝视，足以让所有人都畏缩不前！
zh-tw: 呂布怒目一瞪，眾兵卒無不驚懼畏怯！

eng: Upon nearby enemy unit routing nearby own units recieve a morale buff.
zh-cn: 敌众溃散之时，三军振奋，追战愈勇。
zh-tw: 周遭敵軍單位潰逃時，賦予周遭我方單位士氣增強效果。

eng: To the very bitter end and beyond, if possible, to the very last breath, they will be constant and unswerving.
zh-cn: 此人视死如归，奋战至血尽身死。
zh-tw: 直到最後的最後，如果可以的話，甚至直到最後一口氣，此人都會穩守陣地、絕不低頭。

eng: His relentless attack makes foes cower before him!
zh-cn: 他武艺天下绝伦，敌众闻之胆战心惊
zh-tw: 他無止息的瘋狂攻勢令敵人心驚膽寒！

eng: Nature itself provides a shield for its warriors.
zh-cn: 法自然，如佩坚盾，御阻猛攻。
zh-tw: 大地為它的戰士們提供屏障。

eng: Xiahou Dun fights best in the thick of it, but may lose his composure.
zh-cn: 夏侯惇能借此愈战愈勇，但会因此丧失理智
zh-tw: 夏侯惇在情況危急時反而能發揮最強實力，不過他也容易因此失去理智。

eng: The enemy knows the next shot will not miss.
zh-cn: 「这下一箭，射的就是汝之心窝！」
zh-tw: 敵人深知下一箭必不失準。

eng: Zhuge Liang predicts the wind through study of the world.
zh-cn: 卧龙饱谙天文地理，风向去留亦可观之
zh-tw: 諸葛亮對自然萬物觀察細微而能預知風向。

eng: This legendary presence gives enemies pause.
zh-cn: 此人谋略通神，足令敌踌躇待毙
zh-tw: 此人的傳奇風采使敵人望而卻步。

eng: Gan Ning moves ever faster, as fire spreads through the forest.
zh-cn: 甘宁疾冲之势，如野火飞掠林梢
zh-tw: 甘寧有如燎原野火，動作越發迅捷。

eng: Knowledge of the enemy weakens their defences.
zh-cn: 知敌表里，则彼难守，我易攻
zh-tw: 了解敵人，就能減弱他們的防禦。

zh-cn: 万般无奈之下，唯有殊死一搏。
zh-tw: 萬般無奈之下，唯有殊死一搏。

eng: If you hit them first, they may not hit you.
Adaptation is the only way to live.
zh-cn: 视情况变化而采因应之道。
zh-tw: 視情況變化而採因應之道。

eng: Tightly woven and does not fall off easily.
Armour protects precious warhorses from enemy projectiles.
zh-cn: 保护马匹免于箭矢兵器的伤害。
zh-tw: 保護馬匹免於箭矢兵器的傷害。

eng: With each volley their shots become ever more powerful and accurate.
zh-cn: 下一击将更为精准且更有杀伤力。
zh-tw: 下一擊將更爲精準且更有殺傷力。

eng: The Black Mountain bandits share a special bond. Together, their boldness knows no bounds.
zh-cn: 黑山盗匪们有非常深的兄弟情谊。当他们聚在一起时，勇气倍增。
zh-tw: 黑山盜匪們有非常深的兄弟情誼。當他們聚在一起時，勇氣倍增。

eng: They becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
zh-cn: 他们闻到血腥就会疯狂。
zh-tw: 他們聞到血腥就會瘋狂。

eng: Years of fighting have solidified the faith these soldiers have in each other.
zh-cn: 军团的成员皆长年共处的伙伴，对彼此充满了信念。
zh-tw: 軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。

zh-cn: 军令如山，凡不听约束者斩无赦。
zh-tw: 軍令如山，凡不聽約束者斬無赦。

eng: Bring the fight to them and they will hold their ground.
zh-cn: 一旦交锋，他们能坚守阵地。
zh-tw: 一旦交鋒，他們能堅守陣地。

eng: I have no choice but to pretend that I am a warrior who knows no fear.
zh-cn: 我别无选择，只能假装自己是一个无畏战士
zh-tw: 我别无选择，只能假装自己是一個無畏战士

eng: The flame of hope shines bright in the darkest hour.
zh-cn: 希望之火在最黯时刻光芒闪耀。
zh-tw: 希望之火在最黯時刻光芒閃耀。

eng: Their thirst for battle goes beyond physical limits.
Their energy is like a dragon.
zh-cn: 羽林精锐，内卫京师，外备征战。
zh-tw: 羽林精銳，內衛京師，外備征戰。

eng: Instilled with the resolve of Jing's finest soldiers stand unyielding, their defense bolstered by a legacy of loyalty and skill, making them an immovable force against adversity.
zh-cn: 武术训练能使本就优秀的战士更加善战。
zh-tw: 武術訓練能使本就優秀的戰士更加善戰。

eng: The Black Mountain bandits make their move.
The Force will be with you... always.
Ride, ride to ruin and the world's ending!
zh-cn: 冲啊！冲啊！为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！
zh-tw: 冲啊！ 冲啊！ 为了捍卫天下！勇往直前！

eng: Troops reinforce where they are and solidify their defenses.
zh-cn: 部队原地守卫巩固防御。
zh-tw: 部隊原地守衛鞏固防禦。

eng: Some care not for their own personal safety and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!
The bandits of Taishan discovered how to create thick, rolling smoke by burning certain plants. It's also toxic.
zh-cn: 泰山匪徒发现某些植物燃烧时所冒的烟雾对人体有害。
zh-tw: 泰山匪徒發現某些植物燃燒時所冒的煙霧對人體有害。

eng: In the midst of a bloodbath, it's nice to know that someone has your back.
zh-cn: 在腥风血雨中你仍有所依靠。
zh-tw: 在腥風血雨中你仍有所依靠。

eng: When fighting against or duelling other heroes on the battlefield, they will find their skill and prowess much improved.
zh-cn: 遇强则强，狭路相逢勇者胜。
zh-tw: 遇強則強，狹路相逢勇者勝。

eng: In the face of adversity, those left standing will close ranks and bolster their resolve.
zh-cn: 面对逆境，所剩兵士只能集结起来坚定决心。
zh-tw: 面對逆境，所剩兵士只能集結起來坚定决心。

eng: This unit maneuvers carefully to guard against missile attacks.
They knows how to drive their enemies off the battlefield.
They push the limits of the human body.
The Black Mountain bandits make their stand.
They'll smash anything in their way. Or die.
zh-cn: 他们将粉碎阻挡他们的一切！
zh-tw: 他們將粉碎阻擋他們的一切！

eng: These warriors know how to control fatigue.
zh-cn: 生龙活虎，跋山涉水犹如股掌之上。
zh-tw: 生龍活虎，跋山涉水猶如股掌之上。

eng: The Black Mountain bandits unleash their fury.
Take out their archers. I'll meet you in the middle.
zh-cn: 解决掉他们的弓手，我们到中间会合。
zh-tw: 解決掉他們的弓手，我們到中間會合。

eng: This fearless approach exemplifies their commitment to decisive action, willing to trade safety for the chance of a crushing blow.
zh-cn: 奋勇无畏，果敢行事，甘冒危险以谋求致命一击的机会。
zh-tw: 奮勇無畏，果敢行事，甘冒危險以求致命一擊的機會。

eng: Covers ally troops to retreat safely.
This unit can fire at the enemy whilst remaining hidden.
zh-cn: 匿影潜形，寻找机会行致命一击。
zh-tw: 匿影潛形，尋找機會行致命一擊。

eng: The Black Mountain bandits make their advance.
Speed is the essence of war.
The unit inspires nearby soldiers to fight more cautiously.
zh-cn: 此部队激励附近士卒更谨慎地战斗。
zh-tw: 此單位激勵附近士卒更謹慎地戰鬥。

eng: The unit inspires nearby soldiers to fight more aggressively.
zh-cn: 此部队激励附近士卒更粗莽地战斗。
zh-tw: 此單位激勵附近士卒更粗莽地戰鬥。

eng: High morale unlocks their true potential, enhancing their prowess in the heat of battle.
zh-cn: 士气高昂解锁其真正潜力，在激烈战斗中提升其战力。
zh-tw: 士氣高昂解鎖其真正潛力，在激烈戰鬥中提升其戰力。

eng: Forged in the crucible of conflict with the nomads, their discipline and courage bloom in battle.
zh-cn: 在与游牧民族的烈火锻炼中，他们的纪律和勇气在战斗中绽放。
zh-tw: 在與游牧民族的烈火鍛鍊中，他們的紀律和勇氣在戰鬥中綻放。

eng: Tiger furs provide protection against missile attacks.
These soldiers can quickly switch between offense and defense.
zh-cn: 这些士兵能够迅速在进攻和防守之间切换。
zh-tw: 這些士兵能夠迅速在進攻和防守之間切換。

eng: An ancient chant that serves as a reminder that Heaven is with the virtuous.
zh-tw: 一首古老的歌謠，提醒人們上天會庇佑有德之人。

eng: When they face Xianchenying, they lose confidence.
Stop the horse, pull the rider down, and kill without mercy.
A Rush of Tigers and Leopards

On their first charge, the Tiger & Leopard Cavalry unleash their full might, embodying the overwhelming force of their namesakes. This devastating surge enhances their power, striking fear into the hearts of those who stand against them.
zh-cn: 虎豹骑兵首次冲锋，展现出猛兽般的强大威势。这种毁灭性的冲击使他们的力量提升，令敌人心生畏惧。
zh-tw: 虎豹騎兵首次衝鋒，展現出猛獸般的強大威勢。這種毀滅性的衝擊使他們的力量提升，令敵人心生畏懼。

eng: They will fight hard to uphold the honour of their homeland.
As the enemy looms stronger, resolve deepens, granting boosts in morale and endurance, embodying the spirit of defiance and resilience.
zh-cn: 敌势愈盛，我方意志更坚。怀着不屈战志和坚韧精神，士气和耐力得到提升。
zh-tw: 敵勢愈盛，我方意志更堅。怀著不屈戰志和堅韌精神，士氣和耐力得到提升。

eng: In the thick of battle, soldiers call upon their deepest reserves of strength and skill, gaining an edge in combat at the expense of greater exhaustion, a testament to their determination and training
zh-cn: 鏖战之中，士卒使出最后的体力奋发争取优势，直到筋疲力竭。这是他们的坚定意志和深厚训练的体现。
zh-tw: 鏖戰之中，士卒使出最後的體力奮發爭取優勢，直到筋疲力竭。這是他們的堅定意志和深厚訓練的體現。

eng: Driven by unshakeable belief in victory, units surge forward with a spirited charge, their morale soaring as they close in on the enemy, embodying the fervor of a determined assault.
zh-cn: 怀着必胜的信念，军队奋勇前进，齐心冲锋。他们的士气在逼近敌军时更加高涨，勇猛之势汹涌而来，无可阻挡。
zh-tw: 懷著必勝的信念，軍隊奮勇前進，齊心衝鋒。他們的士氣在逼近敵軍時更加高漲，勇猛之勢洶湧而來，無可阻擋。

eng: The unit splits into missiles at the back, in rows, with melee in front protecting them.
zh-cn: 该单位分成在后方排成数列的远程士兵，以及在前方保护他们的近战士兵
zh-tw: 單位分成在後方排成數列的遠程士兵，以及在前方保護他們的近戰士兵。

eng: Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
The unit presents a wall of spear-points to the enemy - a strong formation that allows the unit to advance slowly but safely whilst defending against charges.
zh-cn: 部队面向敌军形成一道枪墙。这种强大的阵型可以缓慢向敌军推进，并且有效地抵御冲锋
zh-tw: 單位將槍頭指向敵人組成一堵牆，這個強固的陣形可讓單位緩慢但安全的推進，同時抵禦衝鋒攻擊。

eng: The unit forms into a hollow square, presenting spears and pikes to any attacker - particularly cavalry - on all four sides.
zh-cn: 部队结成空心方阵，将长矛伸向四方的任何攻击者，特别是骑兵
zh-tw: 單位組成中空的方陣，將長矛與長槍指向四面來襲的敵人，特別是來襲的騎兵。

eng: The unit presents a wall of shields to the enemy - an offensive formation best used to push forward under arrow fire. However the formation cannot be maintained in melee combat.
zh-cn: 部队面向敌军结成一道盾墙。这种进攻性阵型适合冒着箭雨向前冲锋，但在陷入近战时则无法维持
zh-tw: 單位面對敵人組成一道盾牆，是面對弓箭攻擊時往前推進的最佳進攻陣形。不過無法在近戰中維持此陣形。

eng: The unit spreads apart, making it more difficult for arrows to hit them.
zh-cn: 部队排成松散阵型，令敌方箭矢难以射中他们
zh-tw: 單位呈分散的陣形，使其較不容易被弓箭擊中。

eng: The unit presents a wall of shields to the enemy - an offensive formation best used to push forward under arrow fire.
zh-cn: 部队面向敌军结成一道盾墙。这种进攻性阵型适合冒着箭雨向前冲锋
zh-tw: 單位面對敵人組成一道盾牆，是面對弓箭攻擊時往前推進的最佳進攻陣形。

eng: Simple nut husks, once trodden upon, cause extreme pain and slow movement.
zh-cn: 虽制造简易，踩上去可也是痛不欲生，寸步难移。
zh-tw: 就只是普通的果殼，但踩到可是會劇痛不已，使士兵不良於行。

eng: Thick plumes of smoke obscure line of sight, making units seem temporarily invisible.
zh-cn: 重重烟幕遮天蔽日，使该部队暂时隐身。
zh-tw: 以濃煙阻擋視線，暫時隱蔽單位行蹤。

zh-cn: 再坚韧的铠甲也能被击破。
zh-tw: 再堅韌的鎧甲也能被擊破。

eng: The roar of gunpowder is more terrifying than any man or beast.
zh-cn: 火药的轰鸣声比任何人兽都更可畏。
zh-tw: 火藥的轟鳴聲比任何人獸都更可畏。

eng: This unit has been overwhelmed by the enemy and cannot move properly.
zh-cn: 压倒性的优势之于敌方，令其动弹不得。
zh-tw: 壓倒性的優勢之於敵方，令其動彈不得。

eng: Flammable rosin sticks to clothing and armour.
zh-cn: 将易燃的树脂黏着着于敌人的铠甲之上。
zh-tw: 將易燃的樹脂黏着着於敵人的鎧甲之上。

eng: Whether through hooking, or hacking, axes have a unique ability to reduce the effectiveness of shields.
zh-cn: 不管是用钩还是砍，斧头都是对付盾牌的利器。
zh-tw: 戰斧擁有削弱盾牌效果的獨特能力，不論勾扯或劈砍都管用。

eng: Specially made crossbow bolts from Chen.
zh-cn: 陈国特制的弓弩，威力强大。
zh-tw: 陳國特製的弓弩，威力強大。

eng: Powerful toxins spread and paralyze the body.
zh-cn: 强大的毒素将散布全身导致瘫痪。
zh-tw: 強大的毒素將散佈全身導致癱瘓。

eng: Certain polearms, such as the Ji, can parry incoming attacks.
zh-cn: 像戟这样的长柄武器可以阻挡对方的攻击。
zh-tw: 像戟這樣的長柄武器可以阻擋對方的攻擊。

eng: Shots from the White Horse Fellows give their enemies pause.
Those who toil the land require more utilitarian approaches.
zh-cn: 辛苦劳作的农民们需要的却是更为实用的建筑。
zh-tw: 耕田的人需要的是更為務實的做法。

eng: This is the basic way to correct corruption.
All must take up their tools and participate in the enormous effort of rebuilding society.
zh-cn: 所有人都必须拿起工具，参与到重建社会的大业中去。
zh-tw: 所有人都必須拿起工具，參與到重建社會的大業中去。

eng: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.
zh-cn: 位尊则必担重任，任重则不能轻举。
zh-tw: 權威帶來的責任絕不能等閒視之。

eng: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.
zh-cn: 专注当下：切勿迟疑，但斩前敌。
zh-tw: 專注於當下：只管戰鬥，無須思考。活用直覺。

eng: Martial expertise from hard work. Practice. Preparation. Endless repetition.
zh-cn: 习技艺，服劳苦，勤习无休懈，方可弓马娴熟。
zh-tw: 高強武藝來自勤練。必須孜孜不倦、未雨綢繆、千錘百鍊。

eng: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.
zh-cn: 多谋善计方可立于不败之地。
zh-tw: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。

eng: A hero's resolve is not to seem the bravest, but to be it.
zh-cn: 所谓英雄，不可徒有其表，需当勇冠三军。
zh-tw: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。
